channel.title: +1 Forward - Super Destiny High School Rumble!
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/super-destiny-high-school-rumble
Rich interviews Jessica and Ruth of Five Wits Press about *Super Destiny High School Rumble!!* an anime-inspired PbtA game.
Timecodes: 0:01:11 - Read a Sitch about MCing when the players keep rolling those 10+s 0:08:30 - Open Your Brain to *Super Destiny High School Rumble!!* 0:16:46 - Act Under Fire with Tatsu and Hifumi
Purchase *Super Destiny High School Rumble!!* on DriveThru RPG (aff): https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/280669/Super-Destiny-High-School-Rumble?affiliate_id=78493
Five Wits Press website: https://thefivewitspress.com/

item.title: +1 Forward - Super Destiny High School Rumble!
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

Anders:

It also seems to have a justified use of dual playbooks, which is something I’d like to look closer at.

When Jessica talked about the idea of multiple players having the same playbook for team-ups, it… blew my mind.

Read full topic

item.title: +1 Forward - Super Destiny High School Rumble!
item.dc:creator: @Anders
item.description:
@Anders wrote:

Hearing you talk about this game and play it made me go out and buy it right away. It seems so delightful!

It also seems to have a justified use of dual playbooks, which is something I’d like to look closer at.
